Nightstrike::
 
Nightstrike answered "I acept your challenge you named King of the fighters, I'm Nightstrike Of Decepticon. Where Have I to go to fight against you?"
  gunthers8@... wrote: Ultimo Campeons pod landed less than a kilometer from the Otyebis.  As
he stepped out he looked to his partner weapons, Mucho Hacha and Guarda.
All three nodded to him.

He opened a comm that could be heard on all frequencies.  "This Ultimo
Campeon.  I am the king fighter of all nebulos galactic region, and
have arrived for the IGL.  I am now asking a uno en uno fight of
honour, for training.  All recipitants  of this message that wish to
train, contact me via this private link. <876-9-908854>. Muchos Gracious.
